gr.ictabovo.cpabe.Keyauthority

Class KeyGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.ictabovo.cpabe.Keyauthority.KeyGenerator

  • public class KeyGenerator
extends Object
    This Class is responsible for the Key Generation of the Public Master Key and the Secret Master Key Public Key is used for the encryption process and Master Key is used for the Private Key Generation of the users.
    Author:
    Nick Athanasiou

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyGenerator()
      Default Constructor
      KeyGenerator(SetupParameters setupParameters)
      Constructor with SetupParameters object as variable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SecretMasterKey generateMasterKey()
      Generates a SecretMasterKey object using the SetupParameters object as parameter, first checks if the setupParameters object is null, if it is, it chooses the default ones.
      SecretMasterKey generateMasterKey(SetupParameters params)
      Generates and returns the SecretMasterKey object
      PublicKey generatePublicKey()
      Generates and returns the PublicKey object
      PublicKey generatePublicKey(SetupParameters params)
      Generates the PublicKey object using the SetupParameters object .
